StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetRequestApprovals]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @RequestId uniqueidentifier ) AS
BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT RequestApprovalId, RequestId, RequestApprovalStepId, RequestApprovalStatusId, Comments, IsViewed, ViewedBy, LastUpdateDate, LastUpdateUserId FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[RequestApproval] WHERE RequestId = @RequestId
END
